description:
You
Were Seen 180x More Than Competitors

config: Did you know the Justia Lawyer Directory is one of the most visited directories available online with over one million visitors each month?
Because of your placement, more of those eyes are on you and potential clients are seeing you _____X more than the average lawyers in your area. (USA/State/City/Metro)

description: An enhanced, competitor-free Justia Profile in the Justia Lawyer Directory, ensuring more potential clients keep their eyes on you
Prominent contact information and an integrated contact form so it is easier for prospective clients to reach you
A customized tagline for Justia Premium Placement listing, helping you keep your best foot forward when connecting with new clients
The eye-catching “Premium” label so your Justia Profile stands out across our site
2 for 1 Visibility through featured placements in two top directories both the Justia Lawyer Directory and the Legal Information Institute Directory

config: Thanks for being a Justia client! We are proud to help you continue to grow your firm with these benefits in the year to come.
